column4: My account isn't in the root group ... however all groups appear to be listed twice, some thrice.
Group name 'root', Group ID 0. I reinstalled Gutsy just yesterday so I don't know why it's there.
As you can see, this is a large channel. If you're speaking to someone in particular, please put their nickname in what you say (use !tab), or else messages get lost and it becomes confusing :)
